Haru

Group (2024-present):
XLOV

Introduction

Haru is a Japanese singer, rapper, and member of the boy group XLOV. He was one of the contestants of the 2022 survival show "Boys Planet."

On December 23, 2024 he was revealed as a member of the group XLOV.
